languages.text: "Слава {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трону{/g}! Нормальные лица! Мы уж думали, так и придется сдохнуть среди этих помешанных!" {n}Старик со щербатой усмешкой роняет оружие и протягивает к вам руки.{/n} "Ваш-благородие, не стреляйте в нас, пожалуйста! Дайте слово молвить!"

traits.locale_text: "Слава {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трону{/g}! Нормальные лица! Мы уж думали, так и придется сдохнуть среди этих помешанных!" {n}Старик со щербатой усмешкой роняет оружие и протягивает к вам руки.{/n} "Ваш-благородие, не стреляйте в нас, пожалуйста! Дайте слово молвить!"

languages.text: "Thank the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}! Normal-looking faces! We thought we were going to die here with these nutters!" {n}The old man with a gap-toothed smile drops his weapon and holds out his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "Please don't shoot us, Yer Nobleness! Let us speak a word!"
languages.original_text: "Слава {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трону{/g}! Нормальные лица! Мы уж думали, так и придется сдохнуть среди этих помешанных!" {n}Старик со щербатой усмешкой роняет оружие и протягивает к вам руки.{/n} "Ваш-благородие, не стреляйте в нас, пожалуйста! Дайте слово молвить!"

We thought we were going to die here among these nutters!" {n}The old man with a gap-toothed smile drops his weapon and holds out his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "Please don't shoot us, Yer Nobleness! Let us say a word!"

languages.text: «¡Gracias al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}! ¡Caras con aspecto normal! ¡Pensábamos que moriríamos aquí con estos chiflados!». {n}El anciano, esbozando una sonrisa desdentada, suelta su arma y extiende las manos en un gesto tranquilizador.{/n} «¡Por favor, no nos dispare, Su Nobleza! ¡Permítanos decir unas palabras!».
languages.original_text: "Thank the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}! Normal-looking faces! We thought we were going to die here with these nutters!" {n}The old man with a gap-toothed smile drops his weapon and holds out his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "Please don't shoot us, Yer Nobleness! Let us speak a word!"

traits.locale_text: ¡Gracias al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}! ¡Caras con aspecto normal! ¡Pensábamos que moriríamos aquí con estos chiflados!». {n}El anciano, esbozando una sonrisa desdentada, suelta su arma y extiende las manos en un gesto tranquilizador.{/n} «¡Por favor, no nos dispare, Su Nobleza! ¡Permítanos decir unas palabras!».

languages.text: "Dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} sei Dank! Normale Gesichter! Wir dachten schon, wir würden hier mit diesen durchgeknallten Wahnsinnigen sterben!" {n}Der alte Mann grinst. Ihm fehlen mehrere Zähne. Er lässt seine Waffe fallen und streckt beschwichtigend die Hände von sich.{/n} "Bitte nicht schießen, Euer Erhabenheit! Unterhalten wir uns!"
languages.original_text: "Thank the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}! Normal-looking faces! We thought we were going to die here with these nutters!" {n}The old man with a gap-toothed smile drops his weapon and holds out his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "Please don't shoot us, Yer Nobleness! Let us speak a word!"

traits.locale_text: "Dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} sei Dank! Normale Gesichter! Wir dachten schon, wir würden hier mit diesen durchgeknallten Wahnsinnigen sterben!" {n}Der alte Mann grinst. Ihm fehlen mehrere Zähne. Er lässt seine Waffe fallen und streckt beschwichtigend die Hände von sich.{/n} "Bitte nicht schießen, Euer Erhabenheit! Unterhalten wir uns!"

languages.text: « Le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} soit loué ! Des visages normaux ! On commençait à croire qu'on allait mourir avec ces cinglés ! » {n}Le vieil homme au sourire édenté laisse tomber son arme et tend les mains dans un geste d'apaisement.{/n} « Ne nous tirez pas dessus, Votre Noblesse ! Discutons un peu ! »
languages.original_text: "Thank the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}! Normal-looking faces! We thought we were going to die here with these nutters!" {n}The old man with a gap-toothed smile drops his weapon and holds out his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "Please don't shoot us, Yer Nobleness! Let us speak a word!"

traits.locale_text: « Le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} soit loué ! Des visages normaux ! On commençait à croire qu'on allait mourir avec ces cinglés ! » {n}Le vieil homme au sourire édenté laisse tomber son arme et tend les mains dans un geste d'apaisement.{/n} « Ne nous tirez pas dessus, Votre Noblesse ! Discutons un peu ! »

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}保佑！终于见着正常人了！我还以为我会和这些疯子一起死在这里呢！”{n}豁牙老头咧嘴一笑，扔下武器，举起双手表示没有敌意。{/n}“请别开火，大人！请容我说句话！”
languages.original_text: "Thank the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}! Normal-looking faces! We thought we were going to die here with these nutters!" {n}The old man with a gap-toothed smile drops his weapon and holds out his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "Please don't shoot us, Yer Nobleness! Let us speak a word!"

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}保佑！终于见着正常人了！我还以为我会和这些疯子一起死在这里呢！”{n}豁牙老头咧嘴一笑，扔下武器，举起双手表示没有敌意。{/n}“请别开火，大人！请容我说句话！”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}に感謝を！普通の顔をした連中がいた！この変人どもと一緒にここで死ぬかと思ったぜ！」{n}歯並びの悪い笑顔の老人は武器を落とし、なだめるように両手を差し出した。{/n}「どうか俺たちを撃たないでくれ、貴族様！少し話を聞いてくれ！」
languages.original_text: "Thank the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}! Normal-looking faces! We thought we were going to die here with these nutters!" {n}The old man with a gap-toothed smile drops his weapon and holds out his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "Please don't shoot us, Yer Nobleness! Let us speak a word!"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}に感謝します！普通の姿だ！ この狂人達と共にここでくたばるかと思ったよ！」{n}老人は笑顔を浮かべて、すきっ歯を晒し、武器を落として、こちらをなだめるように手を差し出した。{/n}「どうか撃たないでくれ、貴族様！少し話を聞いてくれ！」
「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}に感謝を！普通の顔をした連中がいた！この変人どもと一緒にここで死ぬかと思ったぜ！」{n}歯並びの悪い笑顔の老人は武器を落とし、なだめるように両手を差し出した。{/n}「どうか俺たちを撃たないでくれ、貴族様！少し話を聞いてくれ！」

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht'a{/g} şükürler olsun, nihayet normal yüzler! Bu delilerin arasında öleceğimizi sandık!" {n}Ayrık dişleriyle gülümseyen yaşlı adam, silahını bırakıp sükûnet verici bir tavırla ellerini uzatıyor.{/n} "Lütfen bizi vurmayın soylu hazretleri! Durun derdimizi anlatalım!"
languages.original_text: "Thank the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}! Normal-looking faces! We thought we were going to die here with these nutters!" {n}The old man with a gap-toothed smile drops his weapon and holds out his hands in a placating gesture.{/n} "Please don't shoot us, Yer Nobleness! Durun derdimizi anlatalım!"
